outputs.output_descr: UNDP implemented the Strengthening Hydropower Safety (SHS) Project to assist the Government of China in strengthening the seismic safety of hydropower projects, ensuring the safe and sustainable recovery and reconstruction in catchment areas.

To response to Wenchuan Earthquake, with the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia contribution of US$ 1 million, UNDP support shelter rebuilding integrated with sustainable recovery and reconstruction in Beichuan.

project_descr: Umbrella Programme on Early Recovery and Disaster Risk Management Programme in China
project_title: Umbrella Program of Post-Wenchuan Earthquake Recovery
